blocks.name: tgcgrcomimp
blocks.content: Congruence commutes on the RHS. Theorem 2.5 of [Schwabhauser] p. 27. (Contributed by David A. Wheeler, 29-Jun-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm tgcgrcomimp(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wi(wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), co(c3, c1, c4)), wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), co(c4, c1, c3))))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cbs, c6))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cds, c6))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(citv, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c6, cstrkg))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, c5))
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wi(wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), co(c3, c1, c4)), wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), co(c4, c1, c3)))), wi(w0, wcel(c0, c5)))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wi(wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), co(c3, c1, c4)), wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), co(c4, c1, c3)))), wi(w0, wcel(c2, c5)))
  biimpd(w0, wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), co(c3, c1, c4)), wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), co(c4, c1, c3)))
  eqeq2d(co(c0, c1, c2), co(c3, c1, c4), co(c4, c1, c3), w0)
  axtgcgrrflx(c3, c1, c4, c5, c6, c7, w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm tgcgrcomimp(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →((c0[c1]c2)=(c3[c1]c4)→(c0[c1]c2)=(c4[c1]c3)))
  ⊣ c5 =(Base ` c6)
  ⊣ c1 =(dist ` c6)
  ⊣ c7 =(Itv ` c6)
  ⊣ (w0 → c6 ∈ TarskiG)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c5)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ c5)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ c5)
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈ c5)
} = {
  a1ii((w0 →((c0[c1]c2)=(c3[c1]c4)→(c0[c1]c2)=(c4[c1]c3))), (w0 → c0 ∈ c5))
  a1ii((w0 →((c0[c1]c2)=(c3[c1]c4)→(c0[c1]c2)=(c4[c1]c3))), (w0 → c2 ∈ c5))
  biimpd(w0, (c0[c1]c2)=(c3[c1]c4), (c0[c1]c2)=(c4[c1]c3))
  eqeq2d((c0[c1]c2), (c3[c1]c4), (c4[c1]c3), w0)
  axtgcgrrflx(c3, c1, c4, c5, c6, c7, w0)
}

blocks.name: tgcgrcomr
blocks.content: Congruence commutes on the RHS. Variant of Theorem 2.5 of [Schwabhauser] p. 27, but in a convenient form for a common case. (Contributed by David A. Wheeler, 29-Jun-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm tgcgrcomr(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), co(c3, c1, c4)))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cbs, c6))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cds, c6))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(citv, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c6, cstrkg))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), co(c4, c1, c3)))
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), co(c3, c1, c4))), wi(w0, wcel(c0, c5)))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), co(c3, c1, c4))), wi(w0, wcel(c2, c5)))
  eqtrd(co(c0, c1, c2), co(c3, c1, c4), co(c4, c1, c3), w0)
  axtgcgrrflx(c4, c1, c3, c5, c6, c7, w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm tgcgrcomr(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[c1]c2)=(c3[c1]c4))
  ⊣ c5 =(Base ` c6)
  ⊣ c1 =(dist ` c6)
  ⊣ c7 =(Itv ` c6)
  ⊣ (w0 → c6 ∈ TarskiG)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c5)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ c5)
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈ c5)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ c5)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c0[c1]c2)=(c4[c1]c3))
} = {
  a1ii((w0 →(c0[c1]c2)=(c3[c1]c4)), (w0 → c0 ∈ c5))
  a1ii((w0 →(c0[c1]c2)=(c3[c1]c4)), (w0 → c2 ∈ c5))
  eqtrd((c0[c1]c2), (c3[c1]c4), (c4[c1]c3), w0)
  axtgcgrrflx(c4, c1, c3, c5, c6, c7, w0)
}

blocks.name: tgcgrcoml
blocks.content: Congruence commutes on the LHS. Variant of Theorem 2.5 of [Schwabhauser] p. 27, but in a convenient form for a common case. (Contributed by David A. Wheeler, 29-Jun-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm tgcgrcoml(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), co(c3, c1, c4)))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cbs, c6))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cds, c6))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(citv, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c6, cstrkg))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(co(c2, c1, c0), co(c3, c1, c4)))
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), co(c3, c1, c4))), wi(w0, wcel(c3, c5)))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), co(c3, c1, c4))), wi(w0, wcel(c4, c5)))
  eqtr3d(co(c0, c1, c2), co(c3, c1, c4), co(c2, c1, c0), w0)
  axtgcgrrflx(c2, c1, c0, c5, c6, c7, w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm tgcgrcoml(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[c1]c2)=(c3[c1]c4))
  ⊣ c5 =(Base ` c6)
  ⊣ c1 =(dist ` c6)
  ⊣ c7 =(Itv ` c6)
  ⊣ (w0 → c6 ∈ TarskiG)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ c5)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c5)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ c5)
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈ c5)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c2[c1]c0)=(c3[c1]c4))
} = {
  a1ii((w0 →(c0[c1]c2)=(c3[c1]c4)), (w0 → c3 ∈ c5))
  a1ii((w0 →(c0[c1]c2)=(c3[c1]c4)), (w0 → c4 ∈ c5))
  eqtr3d((c0[c1]c2), (c3[c1]c4), (c2[c1]c0), w0)
  axtgcgrrflx(c2, c1, c0, c5, c6, c7, w0)
}

blocks.name: tgcgrcomlr
blocks.content: Congruence commutes on both sides. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 23-Mar-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm tgcgrcomlr(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), co(c3, c1, c4)))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cbs, c6))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cds, c6))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(citv, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c6, cstrkg))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(co(c2, c1, c0), co(c4, c1, c3)))
} = {
  3eqtr3d(co(c0, c1, c2), co(c3, c1, c4), co(c2, c1, c0), co(c4, c1, c3), w0)
  axtgcgrrflx(c2, c1, c0, c5, c6, c7, w0)
  axtgcgrrflx(c4, c1, c3, c5, c6, c7, w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm tgcgrcomlr(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[c1]c2)=(c3[c1]c4))
  ⊣ c5 =(Base ` c6)
  ⊣ c1 =(dist ` c6)
  ⊣ c7 =(Itv ` c6)
  ⊣ (w0 → c6 ∈ TarskiG)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ c5)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c5)
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈ c5)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ c5)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c2[c1]c0)=(c4[c1]c3))
} = {
  3eqtr3d((c0[c1]c2), (c3[c1]c4), (c2[c1]c0), (c4[c1]c3), w0)
  axtgcgrrflx(c2, c1, c0, c5, c6, c7, w0)
  axtgcgrrflx(c4, c1, c3, c5, c6, c7, w0)
}

blocks.name: tgcgreqb
blocks.content: Congruence and equality. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 27-Aug-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm tgcgreqb(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c3)))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c5))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cds, c5))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(citv, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, cstrkg))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, c6, c1), co(c2, c6, c3)))
} = {
  impbida(w0, wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c3))
  axtgcgrid(c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, c7, c1, wa(w0, wceq(c0, c1)))
  adantr(w0, wceq(c0, c1), wcel(c5, cstrkg))
  adantr(w0, wceq(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c4))
  adantr(w0, wceq(c0, c1), wcel(c3, c4))
  adantr(w0, wceq(c0, c1), wcel(c1, c4))
  eqtr3d(co(c2, c6, c3), co(c1, c6, c1), co(c0, c6, c1), wa(w0, wceq(c0, c1)))
  adantr(w0, wceq(c0, c1), wceq(co(c0, c6, c1), co(c2, c6, c3)))
  oveq1d(c0, c6, c1, c1, wa(w0, wceq(c0, c1)))
  simpr(w0, wceq(c0, c1))
  axtgcgrid(c0, c1, c4, c5, c6, c7, c3, wa(w0, wceq(c2, c3)))
  adantr(w0, wceq(c2, c3), wcel(c5, cstrkg))
  adantr(w0, wceq(c2, c3), wcel(c0, c4))
  adantr(w0, wceq(c2, c3), wcel(c1, c4))
  adantr(w0, wceq(c2, c3), wcel(c3, c4))
  eqtrd(co(c0, c6, c1), co(c3, c6, c3), co(c2, c6, c3), wa(w0, wceq(c2, c3)))
  adantr(w0, wceq(c2, c3), wceq(co(c0, c6, c1), co(c2, c6, c3)))
  oveq1d(c2, c6, c3, c3, wa(w0, wceq(c2, c3)))
  simpr(w0, wceq(c2, c3))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm tgcgreqb(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0 = c1 ↔ c2 = c3))
  ⊣ c4 =(Base ` c5)
  ⊣ c6 =(dist ` c5)
  ⊣ c7 =(Itv ` c5)
  ⊣ (w0 → c5 ∈ TarskiG)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c0[c6]c1)=(c2[c6]c3))
} = {
  impbida(w0, c0 = c1, c2 = c3)
  axtgcgrid(c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, c7, c1, (w0 ∧ c0 = c1))
  adantr(w0, c0 = c1, c5 ∈ TarskiG)
  adantr(w0, c0 = c1, c2 ∈ c4)
  adantr(w0, c0 = c1, c3 ∈ c4)
  adantr(w0, c0 = c1, c1 ∈ c4)
  eqtr3d((c2[c6]c3), (c1[c6]c1), (c0[c6]c1), (w0 ∧ c0 = c1))
  adantr(w0, c0 = c1, (c0[c6]c1)=(c2[c6]c3))
  oveq1d(c0, c6, c1, c1, (w0 ∧ c0 = c1))
  simpr(w0, c0 = c1)
  axtgcgrid(c0, c1, c4, c5, c6, c7, c3, (w0 ∧ c2 = c3))
  adantr(w0, c2 = c3, c5 ∈ TarskiG)
  adantr(w0, c2 = c3, c0 ∈ c4)
  adantr(w0, c2 = c3, c1 ∈ c4)
  adantr(w0, c2 = c3, c3 ∈ c4)
  eqtrd((c0[c6]c1), (c3[c6]c3), (c2[c6]c3), (w0 ∧ c2 = c3))
  adantr(w0, c2 = c3, (c0[c6]c1)=(c2[c6]c3))
  oveq1d(c2, c6, c3, c3, (w0 ∧ c2 = c3))
  simpr(w0, c2 = c3)
}

blocks.name: tgcgreq
blocks.content: Congruence and equality. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 27-Aug-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm tgcgreq(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(c0, c1))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c3))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cds, c3))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(citv, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cstrkg))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c6, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c7, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(co(c6, c4, c7), co(c0, c4, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c6, c7))
} = {
  mpbid(w0, wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c6, c7))
  tgcgreqb(c6, c7, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm tgcgreq(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 = c1)
  ⊣ c2 =(Base ` c3)
  ⊣ c4 =(dist ` c3)
  ⊣ c5 =(Itv ` c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ TarskiG)
  ⊣ (w0 → c6 ∈ c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c7 ∈ c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c2)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c6[c4]c7)=(c0[c4]c1))
  ⊣ (w0 → c6 = c7)
} = {
  mpbid(w0, c0 = c1, c6 = c7)
  tgcgreqb(c6, c7, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, w0)
}

blocks.name: tgcgrneq
blocks.content: Congruence and equality. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 27-Aug-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm tgcgrneq(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wne(c0, c1))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c3))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cds, c3))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(citv, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cstrkg))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c6, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c7, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(co(c6, c4, c7), co(c0, c4, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wne(c6, c7))
} = {
  mpbid(w0, wne(c0, c1), wne(c6, c7))
  necon3bid(c6, c7, c0, c1, w0)
  tgcgreqb(c6, c7, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm tgcgrneq(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 ≠ c1)
  ⊣ c2 =(Base ` c3)
  ⊣ c4 =(dist ` c3)
  ⊣ c5 =(Itv ` c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ TarskiG)
  ⊣ (w0 → c6 ∈ c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c7 ∈ c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c2)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c6[c4]c7)=(c0[c4]c1))
  ⊣ (w0 → c6 ≠ c7)
} = {
  mpbid(w0, c0 ≠ c1, c6 ≠ c7)
  necon3bid(c6, c7, c0, c1, w0)
  tgcgreqb(c6, c7, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, w0)
}

blocks.name: tgcgrtriv
blocks.content: Degenerate segments are congruent. Theorem 2.8 of [Schwabhauser] p. 28. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 23-Mar-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm tgcgrtriv(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, c1, c0), co(c2, c1, c2)))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c4))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cds, c4))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(citv, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, cstrkg))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c3))
} = {
  r19.29a(hs0, c3, w0, wceq(co(c0, c1, c0), co(c2, c1, c2)), wa(wcel(c0, co(c2, c5, cv(hs0))), wceq(co(c0, c1, cv(hs0)), co(c2, c1, c2))))
  eqtrd(co(c0, c1, c0), co(c2, c1, c2), co(c0, c1, cv(hs0)), wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c3)), wa(wcel(c0, co(c2, c5, cv(hs0))), wceq(co(c0, c1, cv(hs0)), co(c2, c1, c2)))))
  oveq2d(c0, c1, c0, cv(hs0), wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c3)), wa(wcel(c0, co(c2, c5, cv(hs0))), wceq(co(c0, c1, cv(hs0)), co(c2, c1, c2)))))
  axtgcgrid(c0, cv(hs0), c3, c4, c1, c5, c2, wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c3)), wa(wcel(c0, co(c2, c5, cv(hs0))), wceq(co(c0, c1, cv(hs0)), co(c2, c1, c2)))))
  ad2antrr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wa(wcel(c0, co(c2, c5, cv(hs0))), wceq(co(c0, c1, cv(hs0)), co(c2, c1, c2))), wcel(c4, cstrkg))
  ad2antrr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wa(wcel(c0, co(c2, c5, cv(hs0))), wceq(co(c0, c1, cv(hs0)), co(c2, c1, c2))), wcel(c0, c3))
  simplr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wa(wcel(c0, co(c2, c5, cv(hs0))), wceq(co(c0, c1, cv(hs0)), co(c2, c1, c2))))
  ad2antrr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wa(wcel(c0, co(c2, c5, cv(hs0))), wceq(co(c0, c1, cv(hs0)), co(c2, c1, c2))), wcel(c2, c3))
  simprr(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c3)), wcel(c0, co(c2, c5, cv(hs0))), wceq(co(c0, c1, cv(hs0)), co(c2, c1, c2)))
  axtgsegcon(hs0, c3, c0, c2, c5, c1, c2, c2, c4, w0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(co(c0, c1, c0), co(c2, c1, c2)))
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm tgcgrtriv(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[c1]c0)=(c2[c1]c2))
  ⊣ c3 =(Base ` c4)
  ⊣ c1 =(dist ` c4)
  ⊣ c5 =(Itv ` c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈ TarskiG)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ c3)
} = {
  r19.29a(hs0, c3, w0, (c0[c1]c0)=(c2[c1]c2), (c0 ∈(c2[c5]hs0)∧(c0[c1]hs0)=(c2[c1]c2)))
  eqtrd((c0[c1]c0), (c2[c1]c2), (c0[c1]hs0), ((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c3)∧(c0 ∈(c2[c5]hs0)∧(c0[c1]hs0)=(c2[c1]c2))))
  oveq2d(c0, c1, c0, hs0, ((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c3)∧(c0 ∈(c2[c5]hs0)∧(c0[c1]hs0)=(c2[c1]c2))))
  axtgcgrid(c0, hs0, c3, c4, c1, c5, c2, ((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c3)∧(c0 ∈(c2[c5]hs0)∧(c0[c1]hs0)=(c2[c1]c2))))
  ad2antrr(w0, hs0 ∈ c3, (c0 ∈(c2[c5]hs0)∧(c0[c1]hs0)=(c2[c1]c2)), c4 ∈ TarskiG)
  ad2antrr(w0, hs0 ∈ c3, (c0 ∈(c2[c5]hs0)∧(c0[c1]hs0)=(c2[c1]c2)), c0 ∈ c3)
  simplr(w0, hs0 ∈ c3, (c0 ∈(c2[c5]hs0)∧(c0[c1]hs0)=(c2[c1]c2)))
  ad2antrr(w0, hs0 ∈ c3, (c0 ∈(c2[c5]hs0)∧(c0[c1]hs0)=(c2[c1]c2)), c2 ∈ c3)
  simprr((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c3), c0 ∈(c2[c5]hs0), (c0[c1]hs0)=(c2[c1]c2))
  axtgsegcon(hs0, c3, c0, c2, c5, c1, c2, c2, c4, w0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.w((c0[c1]c0)=(c2[c1]c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}

blocks.name: tgcgrextend
blocks.content: Link congruence over a pair of line segments. Theorem 2.11 of [Schwabhauser] p. 29. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 23-Mar-2019.) (Shortened by David A. Wheeler and Thierry Arnoux, 22-Apr-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm tgcgrextend(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, class c9, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), co(c3, c1, c4)))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cbs, c6))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cds, c6))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(citv, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c6, cstrkg))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c8, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c9, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c8, co(c0, c7, c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c9, co(c3, c7, c4)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, c1, c8), co(c3, c1, c9)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(co(c8, c1, c2), co(c9, c1, c4)))
} = {
  pm2.61dane(c0, c8, w0, wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), co(c3, c1, c4)))
  3eqtr4d(co(c0, c1, c2), co(c3, c1, c4), co(c8, c1, c2), co(c9, c1, c4), wa(w0, wceq(c0, c8)))
  adantr(w0, wceq(c0, c8), wceq(co(c8, c1, c2), co(c9, c1, c4)))
  oveq1d(c0, c1, c2, c8, wa(w0, wceq(c0, c8)))
  oveq1d(c3, c1, c4, c9, wa(w0, wceq(c0, c8)))
  tgcgreq(c3, c9, c5, c6, c1, c7, c0, c8, wa(w0, wceq(c0, c8)))
  adantr(w0, wceq(c0, c8), wcel(c6, cstrkg))
  adantr(w0, wceq(c0, c8), wcel(c0, c5))
  adantr(w0, wceq(c0, c8), wcel(c8, c5))
  adantr(w0, wceq(c0, c8), wcel(c3, c5))
  adantr(w0, wceq(c0, c8), wcel(c9, c5))
  adantr(w0, wceq(c0, c8), wceq(co(c0, c1, c8), co(c3, c1, c9)))
  simpr(w0, wceq(c0, c8))
  tgcgrcomlr(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, c7, wa(w0, wne(c0, c8)))
  axtg5seg(c2, c1, c0, c4, c3, c5, c6, c7, c0, c8, c3, c9, wa(w0, wne(c0, c8)))
  adantr(w0, wne(c0, c8), wcel(c2, c5))
  adantr(w0, wne(c0, c8), wcel(c4, c5))
  simpr(w0, wne(c0, c8))
  adantr(w0, wne(c0, c8), wcel(c8, co(c0, c7, c2)))
  adantr(w0, wne(c0, c8), wcel(c9, co(c3, c7, c4)))
  adantr(w0, wne(c0, c8), wceq(co(c8, c1, c2), co(c9, c1, c4)))
  tgcgrtriv(c0, c1, c3, c5, c6, c7, wa(w0, wne(c0, c8)))
  tgcgrcomlr(c8, c1, c0, c9, c3, c5, c6, c7, wa(w0, wne(c0, c8)))
  adantr(w0, wne(c0, c8), wcel(c6, cstrkg))
  adantr(w0, wne(c0, c8), wcel(c0, c5))
  adantr(w0, wne(c0, c8), wcel(c8, c5))
  adantr(w0, wne(c0, c8), wcel(c3, c5))
  adantr(w0, wne(c0, c8), wcel(c9, c5))
  adantr(w0, wne(c0, c8), wceq(co(c0, c1, c8), co(c3, c1, c9)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm tgcgrextend(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, class c9, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[c1]c2)=(c3[c1]c4))
  ⊣ c5 =(Base ` c6)
  ⊣ c1 =(dist ` c6)
  ⊣ c7 =(Itv ` c6)
  ⊣ (w0 → c6 ∈ TarskiG)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c5)
  ⊣ (w0 → c8 ∈ c5)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ c5)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ c5)
  ⊣ (w0 → c9 ∈ c5)
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈ c5)
  ⊣ (w0 → c8 ∈(c0[c7]c2))
  ⊣ (w0 → c9 ∈(c3[c7]c4))
  ⊣ (w0 →(c0[c1]c8)=(c3[c1]c9))
  ⊣ (w0 →(c8[c1]c2)=(c9[c1]c4))
} = {
  pm2.61dane(c0, c8, w0, (c0[c1]c2)=(c3[c1]c4))
  3eqtr4d((c0[c1]c2), (c3[c1]c4), (c8[c1]c2), (c9[c1]c4), (w0 ∧ c0 = c8))
  adantr(w0, c0 = c8, (c8[c1]c2)=(c9[c1]c4))
  oveq1d(c0, c1, c2, c8, (w0 ∧ c0 = c8))
  oveq1d(c3, c1, c4, c9, (w0 ∧ c0 = c8))
  tgcgreq(c3, c9, c5, c6, c1, c7, c0, c8, (w0 ∧ c0 = c8))
  adantr(w0, c0 = c8, c6 ∈ TarskiG)
  adantr(w0, c0 = c8, c0 ∈ c5)
  adantr(w0, c0 = c8, c8 ∈ c5)
  adantr(w0, c0 = c8, c3 ∈ c5)
  adantr(w0, c0 = c8, c9 ∈ c5)
  adantr(w0, c0 = c8, (c0[c1]c8)=(c3[c1]c9))
  simpr(w0, c0 = c8)
  tgcgrcomlr(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, c7, (w0 ∧ c0 ≠ c8))
  axtg5seg(c2, c1, c0, c4, c3, c5, c6, c7, c0, c8, c3, c9, (w0 ∧ c0 ≠ c8))
  adantr(w0, c0 ≠ c8, c2 ∈ c5)
  adantr(w0, c0 ≠ c8, c4 ∈ c5)
  simpr(w0, c0 ≠ c8)
  adantr(w0, c0 ≠ c8, c8 ∈(c0[c7]c2))
  adantr(w0, c0 ≠ c8, c9 ∈(c3[c7]c4))
  adantr(w0, c0 ≠ c8, (c8[c1]c2)=(c9[c1]c4))
  tgcgrtriv(c0, c1, c3, c5, c6, c7, (w0 ∧ c0 ≠ c8))
  tgcgrcomlr(c8, c1, c0, c9, c3, c5, c6, c7, (w0 ∧ c0 ≠ c8))
  adantr(w0, c0 ≠ c8, c6 ∈ TarskiG)
  adantr(w0, c0 ≠ c8, c0 ∈ c5)
  adantr(w0, c0 ≠ c8, c8 ∈ c5)
  adantr(w0, c0 ≠ c8, c3 ∈ c5)
  adantr(w0, c0 ≠ c8, c9 ∈ c5)
  adantr(w0, c0 ≠ c8, (c0[c1]c8)=(c3[c1]c9))
}

blocks.name: tgsegconeq
blocks.content: Two points that satisfy the conclusion of ~ axtgsegcon are identical. Uniqueness portion of Theorem 2.12 of [Schwabhauser] p. 29. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 23-Mar-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm tgsegconeq(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, class c9, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(c0, c1))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c3))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cds, c3))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(citv, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cstrkg))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c6, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c7, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c8, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c9, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wne(c9, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c6, co(c9, c5, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c6, co(c9, c5, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(co(c6, c4, c0), co(c7, c4, c8)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(co(c6, c4, c1), co(c7, c4, c8)))
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(c0, c1)), wi(w0, wcel(c7, c2)))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(c0, c1)), wi(w0, wcel(c8, c2)))
  axtgcgrid(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c0, w0)
  eqcomd(co(c0, c4, c1), co(c0, c4, c0), w0)
  axtg5seg(c0, c4, c0, c0, c1, c2, c3, c5, c9, c6, c9, c6, w0)
  eqidd(co(c6, c4, c0), w0)
  tgcgrextend(c9, c4, c0, c9, c1, c2, c3, c5, c6, c6, w0)
  eqidd(co(c9, c4, c6), w0)
  eqtr4d(co(c6, c4, c0), co(c6, c4, c1), co(c7, c4, c8), w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm tgsegconeq(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, class c9, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 = c1)
  ⊣ c2 =(Base ` c3)
  ⊣ c4 =(dist ` c3)
  ⊣ c5 =(Itv ` c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ TarskiG)
  ⊣ (w0 → c6 ∈ c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c7 ∈ c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c8 ∈ c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c9 ∈ c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c9 ≠ c6)
  ⊣ (w0 → c6 ∈(c9[c5]c0))
  ⊣ (w0 → c6 ∈(c9[c5]c1))
  ⊣ (w0 →(c6[c4]c0)=(c7[c4]c8))
  ⊣ (w0 →(c6[c4]c1)=(c7[c4]c8))
} = {
  a1ii((w0 → c0 = c1), (w0 → c7 ∈ c2))
  a1ii((w0 → c0 = c1), (w0 → c8 ∈ c2))
  axtgcgrid(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c0, w0)
  eqcomd((c0[c4]c1), (c0[c4]c0), w0)
  axtg5seg(c0, c4, c0, c0, c1, c2, c3, c5, c9, c6, c9, c6, w0)
  eqidd((c6[c4]c0), w0)
  tgcgrextend(c9, c4, c0, c9, c1, c2, c3, c5, c6, c6, w0)
  eqidd((c9[c4]c6), w0)
  eqtr4d((c6[c4]c0), (c6[c4]c1), (c7[c4]c8), w0)
}
